name: ada-hyperscale-core
description: Core interface for Ada Stargate's Cognitive Operating System. Connects to the Python Backend (FastAPI/LangGraph).

tools.name: query_cognitive_brain
tools.description: Sends a prompt to the central LangGraph Orchestrator. Handles Routing, RAG, SEAL (Learning), and MAKER (Math) capabilities automatically.

prompt.description: The user's request (e.g., 'Calculate mooring fee', 'Update speed rule').

context.description: Optional operational context (vessel count, weather) to inject into the brain.

tools.name: trigger_memory_ingestion
tools.description: Forces the system to re-read the 'docs/' folder and update the Qdrant Vector Database. Use after modifying regulations.

force_rebuild.description: If true, deletes existing collection before ingestion.

tools.name: get_live_telemetry
tools.description: Fetches real-time sensor data via the MQTT Gateway.

topic.description: Specific topic to subscribe to (e.g. 'wim/weather/wind', 'vessel/phisedelia/battery'). Leave empty for full dump.
